title: $1,900 - 3 Bedroom 1 Bathroom - Huge yard!
posting_body: Three bedroom apartment in West Ridge in a fabulous two flat building featuring a very large fenced in yard.
This unit has a newly renovated kitchen with soft close cabinetry, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances.
Lots of windows with natural light and hardwood floors.
Laundry in the basement, which can be accessed through an indoor stairwell - you don’t have to go outside!
On-site garage parking is available for an extra monthly fee.
Pets are allowed, inquire for additional information.
This is a great location in a quiet, tree-lined neighborhood with an 86/100 Redfin walk score!
It’s close to Northwestern and Loyola Universities, parks, restaurants, Starbucks (drive-thru!), and bars.

Near CTA transportation (Western and Howard buses, Howard red line stop) and a short distance from Evanston, Edgewater, Andersonville, Lake Shore Drive, I-94, running & bike paths, and of course - the beach!
